meanings.sent1: The noninterlaced threads created a smooth fabric.
meanings.sent2: The noninterlaced wires were easy to separate.
meanings.sent3: The noninterlaced puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were noninterlaced, each one standing alone.
meanings.sent5: The noninterlaced design gave the room a modern look.

meanings.definition: Not alternating or blending together in a regular pattern.
meanings.sent1: The noninterlaced colors on the painting stood out individually.
meanings.sent2: The noninterlaced sounds in the music created a unique composition.
meanings.sent3: The noninterlaced flavors in the dish surprised her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: His noninterlaced ideas clashed in a chaotic debate.
meanings.sent5: The noninterlaced patterns on the dress made it eye-catching.
